channel.title: Help with server shops
channel.description: Okay my friend wants me to add shops and items on his server but idk how to can you give me the codes on how add shops? i mean like i need to spawn the npc then add the items but how idk beginner coder help me please thanks!

item.title: Help with server shops
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“14-08, post:3, topic:292391”][quote author=leacher1197 link=topic=386300.msg2895462#msg2895462 date=1249182405]

Okay my friend wants me to add shops and items on his server but idk how to can you give me the codes on how add shops? i mean like i need to spawn the npc then add the items but how idk beginner coder help me please thanks!
[/quote] Please check the tutorial forum area, There are many tutorials on adding NPC’s/Shop’s and MUCH MUCH more!!
Please use the power of the search button.

I have never seen a tutorial for adding shops to anything but a 508 or higher. And, I know Pokemondner never said if he was on a 317 or a 508, but I have never seen a tutorial on adding shops to a 317.

But, Pokemondner, there is a ‘Shop Generator’. I don’t have it, but it is pretty useful.[/quote]

wow…

every try searching cfg files? for… SHOP.CFG?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server shops
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

[quote=“leacher1197, post:2, topic:292391”][quote author=pokemondner link=topic=386300.msg2895442#msg2895442 date=1249181130]
Okay my friend wants me to add shops and items on his server but idk how to can you give me the codes on how add shops? i mean like i need to spawn the npc then add the items but how idk beginner coder help me please thanks!
[/quote] Please check the tutorial forum area, There are many tutorials on adding NPC’s/Shop’s and MUCH MUCH more!!
Please use the power of the search button.[/quote]

I have never seen a tutorial for adding shops to anything but a 508 or higher. And, I know Pokemondner never said if he was on a 317 or a 508, but I have never seen a tutorial on adding shops to a 317.

But, Pokemondner, there is a ‘Shop Generator’. I don’t have it, but it is pretty useful.

Read full topic
